page.title: 07Farming - Hodore Farm
page.content: My daddy ( I am Geordie ) has a farm of 350 acres.100 acres are woods, hedges,roads,tracks and buildings.145 acres are used to grow grass to feed the 100 cows and 70 heifers. We grow cereals as well:-20 acres oats,30 acres barley and 50 acres grow wheat. My aunt grows strawberries, raspberries and vegetables on 5 acres. Bill Cottington does much of the tractor work.He is 45 years old and has worked here for 30 years.His father worked here for 15 years.Anne Johnson milks the cows and one other person works on the farm.My daddy rents another 70 acres across the river where he grows some more wheat and barley. My daddy works on the farm, keeps the accounts and does all the office work. We have 3 John Deere tractors, and lots of other machines.
